project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion Command-Line Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Create a command-line tool that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement temperature conversion function from Celsius to Fahrenheit
Implement temperature conversion function from Celsius to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function from Fahrenheit to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion function from Fahrenheit to Kelvin
Implement temperature conversion function from Kelvin to Celsius
Implement temperature conversion function from Kelvin to Fahrenheit
Develop command-line interface to gather user inputs
Write tests for each temperature conversion function
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
